Caption: Fig. 1: Knowledge generation model for visual analytics including uncertainty propagation and human trust building. Uncertainty originates at the data source and propagates through the system components which introduce additional uncertainties. Uncertainty awareness influences human trust building on different knowledge generation levels.

Fig. 3: Each system component may change the data and consequently introduce additional uncertainty. Human trust building within knowledge generation processes is affected by many human factors. The relation between uncertainty and trust is included as the awareness of uncertainties.

Fig. 4: Examples for uncertainty aware trust building from different domains: (a) An uncertainty projection to explore how data items are affected by uncertainties [17], (b) decision support including trust cue design from [19], (c) deriving important user notes based on user tracking [43], (d) integrating evidences for computer assisted knowledge management [15].
